text: You are stronger than you know — small steps forward are still progress.
Courage isn't the absence of fear; it's moving forward in spite of it.
Hope can be the quiet voice that carries you through the hardest days.
One day at a time — that single day is all you need to focus on right now.
Your strength today inspires someone else's strength tomorrow.
Healing is not linear — allow yourself rest and celebrate small victories.
Even in uncertainty, your presence matters and your story matters.
Bravery is asking for help when you need it and accepting the care offered.
Sunrise follows the night; tough seasons make the bright ones more meaningful.
Your worth is not defined by illness; it's measured by the love and courage you give.
Let others share your burden — community lightens the heaviest loads.
Keep holding on to the small joys — they stitch a life back together.
A hopeful heart can open new doors for healing and connection.
Rest is productive — taking care of yourself is part of your fight.
Your bravery today becomes a legacy of strength for those who follow.
You are allowed to feel tired and to keep going; both truths can coexist.
Small acts of kindness create a chain that reaches farther than you see.
There is no single way to be courageous — your path is yours alone.
Believe in the tiny shifts; they add up to powerful change over time.
Hope and action together make the clearest path forward.
